laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echotexture without focal lesions. Normal common bile duct measuring 3 mm. The pancreas is normal but the distal tail is not well seen due to overlying bowel gas. The right kidney is without hydronephrosis. The gallbladder is distended with multiple gallstones, including two in the gallbladder neck measuring up to 2 cm. No mural thickening or pericholecystic fluid is seen.
